pkgmetadata.longdescription: Eye-Tracking Data Analysis // Addresses tasks along the pipeline from raw data to analysis and visualization for eye-tracking data. Offers several popular types of analyses, including linear and growth curve time analyses, onset-contingent reaction time analyses, as well as several non-parametric bootstrapping approaches. For references to the approach see Mirman, Dixon Magnuson (2008) doi:10.1016/j.jml.2007.11.006, and Barr (2008) doi:10.1016/j.jml.2007.09.002.
